name: A Dangerous Game: Treasure Dungeon
description:
A one-chapter game created for the SRPG Studio One-for-All game jam.  You are a contestant on a game show, where you and your friends have been tossed into a dungeon and your goal is to defeat as many enemies and loot as much treasure as you can before time runs out!

Features:

  • Fire Emblem-style gameplay including the weapon triangle, debuff-inflicting knives, funny single-RNG, and more!
  • Create an Avatar with custom boon and bane setups for both stats and weapon types.
  • Reclassing!  There are 25 character classes for you and your party to choose from, and you, the Avatar, can pick from any one of them!
  • Randomized treasure to keep you on your toes.  If you're lucky, you might find something really special...

Resources:

  • Class Data
  • Weapon and Item Data
  • Skill Data
